channel.title: Homes on Weicheng Cai
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Weicheng Cai

item.description: Biography I am a second-year Ph.D. candidate in School of Electronics and Information Technology, Sun Yat-sen University, advised by Ming Li (Prof. Li just transfered to Duke Kunshan University from Sun Yat-sen University recently). My research interests mainly focus on automatic speaker and language recognition, particularly towards deep learning based end-to-end approach. Since 2014, I have been studying in the area of speech processing in the lab of Speech and Multimodal Intelligent Information Processing (SMIIP) directed by Prof.

item.title: News
item.description: [Jun. 06, 2018] One of my submitted paper to Interspeech 2018 was accepted, may be I will come to India on Sep. 2-6. [Mar. 30, 2018] My first-author paper has been accepted by Speaker Odyssey 2018. This is a great honor for me as a speaker and language recognition researcher. [Mar. 23, 2018] Two of my paper have been submitted to Interspeech 2018. There are altogether six paper submitted from our labratory (SMIIP).
